ComicInfo.Summary: Witch Hunt Part 2: Sara has awakened from her coma and meets investigator Patrick Gleason who catches up with her in the hospital chapel. He takes her to the church where she was found unconscious to try and jog her memory but Sara only gets brief flashes of what happened to her. Patrick then tells her about his visit to the Curator's shop and Sara insists on going there. Finding the shop closed, Sara breaks into the back door and the pair are attacked by demons.
ComicInfo.Title: Witch Hunt Part 2
